query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS roadmapSteps (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  roadmapId INT NOT NULL,
  stepNumber INT NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  deadline VARCHAR(20),
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 46BqkDT2eofWM8H.root --database 8NGFXyzBvbriU6UGnrxDYi --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS roadmapSteps (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  roadmapId INT NOT NULL,
  stepNumber INT NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  deadline VARCHAR(20),
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
